PLOT:
-----------
It is 1972, and Jeremy Collier has been home from his Vietnam tour for over a year, but he remains shell-shocked and unable to cope with his family. When not suffering from flashbacks, he dreams of putting a bullet in his father's head. The situation results in a terrible family crisis.
